  • Method Details

    • participateToNetwork

      public io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<ClientMessage> participateToNetwork(io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<ServerMessage> responseObserver)
      Starts and keeps the connections with the client. It defines what the server needs to do when clients connect to the service and call the 'participateToNetwork()' method.
      Overrides:
      participateToNetwork in class FLComGrpc.FLComImplBase
      Parameters:
      responseObserver - Interface for the server to communicate with the client (it sends server messages and errors, or ends the connection).
      Returns:
      a StreamObserver that represents the interface for the client during the communication.
